channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No street lights, 28th April
item.description:
We continue to have no street lights. It has been at least 6 nights without street lights. Surely the problem should be a priority.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Pilley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Building waste left outside of house, 28th April
item.description:
Building waste has been left outside this residence, and people have reported seeing rats around it which isn't great. Needs to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18,20,22,24, Elmfield Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken bridge, 28th April
item.description:
Good morning, a resident has reported to me that the bridge crossing the stream at this point is damaged. I have copied and pasted what he put in his message below. "Sorry to inform you that the first bridge across the brook has been damaged again . Two treads have been removed which are in the brook and the bridge is now quite dangerous." If you need any other information please do not hesitate to contact me. Many thanks Lianne
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two trenches dug across road badly filled in, 27th April
item.description:
There are two channels dug across the road that have been repeatedly filled in poorly and keep sinking creating bad potholes, please fill them in properly, I drive this road every day and they are no doubt damaging my suspension, I would also say they are definitely bad enough for a motorcyclist/cyclist to have a bad accident there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Gas Cylinders - Nitrous Oxide, 27th April
item.description:
The location is the Burnt Oak Cross Roads off Aggs Hiill / Cotswold Way/ Cleeve Common Road. The flytip consists of probably empty small Nitrous Oxide Cylinders in cardboard boxes. One of the Photographs pinpoints the exact location by the actual Burnt Oak Tree. Please can these be collected as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Portland Square, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
